DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Drugs use chemotherapy use different way stop tumor cell divide stop grow die . PURPOSE : Phase II trial study effectiveness chemotherapy paclitaxel treat patient stage IIIB stage IV non-small cell lung cancer .
DOC.brief_title: S9714 : Paclitaxel Treating Patients With Stage IIIB Stage IV Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I. Assess survival , progression-free survival response rate patient bronchioloalveolar carcinoma receive paclitaxel . II . Evaluate toxic effect paclitaxel 96 hour continuous infusion patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive 6 cycle paclitaxel IV continuous infusion 96 hour . Before cycle 4 , restaging perform . If disease progression witness , patient remove study . If stable , partial , complete response observe , patient receive total 6 cycle . Three week last cycle , final restaging perform . Patients follow every 3 month treatment every 6 month thereafter , unless frequent follow-up clinically recommend . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : 50 patient enrol . The accrual rate estimate 25 per year .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically proven Stage IIIB IV bronchioloalveolar nonsmall cell lung carcinoma incompletely resect unresectable tumor may multifocal diffuse measurable evaluable disease require No prior brain metastasis PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : 18 Performance Status : SWOG 02 Life Expectancy : Not specify Hematopoietic : Absolute granulocyte count least 1,500/mm3 Platelet count least 100,000/mm3 Hepatic : Bilirubin great institutional upper limit normal ( ULN ) SGOT great 2 time ULN Renal : Creatinine great institutional ULN OR creatinine clearance least 50 mL/min Other : Not pregnant nursing Effective contraceptive method use study No prior malignancy allow , except : basal squamous cell skin cancer situ cervical cancer Stage I II cancer remission Any cancer patient disease free 5 year PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : No prior biologic therapy lung cancer Chemotherapy : No prior chemotherapy Endocrine therapy : Not specify Radiotherapy : No prior radiation therapy ( include palliative radiotherapy ) Surgery : Prior surgery allow
DOC.keyword: stage IIIB non-small cell lung cancer
stage IV non-small cell lung cancer
